response.answer_text: Paint technology is the study of manufacturing of paints ,conserving coatings, additives used in manufacturing of paints, mechanism of Drying of paints and polymer science related to paint and coatings. There are very few college in India offering B. Tech in paint technology namely :- Harcourt Butler technical university, Kanpur ( formerly HBTI, kanpur)Institute Of Chemical technology, MumbaiUniversity institute of chemical technology, JalgaonLaxminarayan institute of technology, NagpurPaint technology is a good course to choose as paint is a growing industry with a positive future.

Paint technology deals with the study of making of paint - the optimum formulation, the interactions of various components of paint, the mechanism of drying of the paint, various chemistries of polymers used in paints, designing of the equipments used in manufacturing paint and so on. There is a lot of chemistry to study when it comes to formulating a paint and all physics and maths when it comes to designing.
